response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I propose an offer of $750,000 for the product. This price reflects my understanding of its importance to you and aims to provide a fair transaction. Should you find this offer acceptable, please let me know, and we can proceed with the details of the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
